snippet: Top-seeded Maria Sharapova lost, 6-4, 3-6, 4-6, to Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova in the semifinals of the Open GDF Suez in an all-Russian match on Saturday in Paris.
abstract: Top-seeded Maria Sharapova loses to Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova in women's semifinals of the Open GDF Suez in an all-Russian match in Paris; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Maria Sharapova lost, 6-4, 3-6, 4-6, to Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova in the semifinals of the Open GDF Suez in an all-Russian match on Saturday in Paris.
